title: Merit To Remove
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss Colts’ owner Jim Irsay saying there is “merit” to remove Dan Snyder as an NFL owner, if the Phillies or the Padres have the edge in the NLCS and Kendrick Perkins joins the show for 5 Good Minutes.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Tony Kornheiser, Michael Wilbon
itunes:subtitle: PTI: Irsay speaks on Dan Snyder and which team has the edge in the NLCS?
